newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH JAN JOBLESS DATA DUE FEB 14 0830 - MINISTRY.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH JAN JOBLESS DATA DUE FEB 14 0830 - MINISTRY.

text.p: The labour ministry said in a statement on Wednesday that its January employment report will be released on Frioday, February 14 at 0830/0630 GMT.
The mean of six economists' forecasts for the January unemployment rate calculated by the ministry is 18.6 percent (range 18.5-18.8 pct), down from 19.0 percent in December.
